attributes.action: Allow 16-17 year olds to vote in another EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Leaving the EU on the basis of a million votes, when over 1.5 million British citizens were denied the vote, is ludicrously undemocratic. On such a slender margin, consent from the next generation should be sought to confirm the decision's legitimacy. Please repeat the referendum and include me.
attributes.background: 16-17 year olds bitterly resent the fact they were denied the vote in the referendum and must live with the decision for the rest of their lives.
